AssignPublicIp.description: Enables assigning a public IP address to the service tasks.

AdditionalSecurityGroups.description: Define additional security groups to use.

^[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+$.description: The definition of the security group to use

oneOf.description: The security group ID to use. It must belong to the same VPC you are deploying to

Properties.description: Literal properties to set as in https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-ecs-service-serviceconnectconfiguration.html

MacroParameters.description: ECS Compose-X Shorthand syntax to configure ECS Connect.

DnsName.description: DNS name for the clients to find this service

CloudMapServiceName.description: Optional - Set the name of the service as it appears in the CloudMap namespace

PortName.description: Name of the port. Must be the same as ports[].name. If not specified, uses generated port name of the first port in the service.

x-cloudmap.description: Name of the namespace defined in the x-cloudmap root level to use.

oneOf.description: When you want to register the service into CloudMap. First port listed in ports[] used.
Allows you to register the service to multiple registries, and/or use a specific port.

[a-zA-Z0-9-_.]+$.description: The name of the object is the name of the x-cloudmap::<map>.

Port.description: The port to register in SRV record

Name.description: Name of the service. Do not include the cloudmap hostname. Overrides the ecs.task.family.hostname deploy label
